value:
I have made a contract with the
higher powers. The day may come
when we are again enemies—soon.

Are Queen Henriette and Sharena...
safe here, in this world?

Something about Princess Eir has
changed. Some ordeal has spurred
her growth.

The dead weep for no one—neither
do they smile or laugh. Those are
for the living alone.

Éljúðnir is a weapon of death...and
of Hel, who ruled death's realm.

I am Líf. Once my task is complete,
I will depart.

I require strength enough to bring
low the higher powers.

This blade trembles, aching to spread
death's reach...

You have seen what weakness
yet remains...
Well, $Nu...

I am Líf. I seek the power to slay the
gods I have been made to serve.

Éljúðnir is an arcane weapon once
in the possession of Hel, the ruler
of the dead.$k$p...Hel, who took everything from me.$k$pI will not hesitate to take what was
Hel's to use for my own purposes.$k$pThere is someone I must defeat.
I will use any means at my disposal
to reach that end.$k$pAlfonse...is not so different in that
regard. And in the coming battles, he
will not have the luxury of avoiding it.$k$pShould you desire, you may
consider the power of Éljúðnir
to be at your disposal, for now.$k$pAs I am, that is all I am able
to promise you.
Be silenced.
The strong triumph.
Abandon hope.
That which I desire…
Death has come...
I am Líf. I have been granted power by Ganglöt, who rules the dead.
Cease your foolishness. I am in no mood.
I should not be here. My aims lie elsewhere.
Many here recognize me and smile, but...I feel nothing.
No matter who rules the realm of the dead, it is unchanging.
My wish is that you find happiness in this world.
Are you trying yet again to give me hope?
Understood.
Wherever.
As you command.
